STI Care Recommendation values

Codes representing possible values for the STI Care Recommendation element

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10
    CodeDisplay
    Z31.00Perform pregnancy test
    Z32.01Perform pregnancy test
    Z32.02Perform pregnancy test
  • Include these codes as defined in http://who.int/cg/CodeSystem/extended-content
    CodeDisplay
    Partner management recommendedPartner management recommended

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

name: sti-care-recommendation-values
title: STI Care Recommendation values
description: Codes representing possible values for the STI Care Recommendation element
